page.title: 01A PICTURE OF THE AREA.
page.content: Situated in the southern end of the Wirral Peninsula on the River Dee the area within the block contains the village of Caldy,part of the village of Newton and the main town of West Kirby,with its shopping centre,leisure facilities and utilities. The area is characterised by its wide variety of land usage.A part of the area is residential with a wide variety of dwellings.There is also a part of the area used for leisure and recreational facilities,some farm land and a shopping and commercial area situated for the most part in West Kirby. The coastline,part of the estuary of the River Dee with its beach form an important feature as does the Wirral Way and Caldy and Grange Hills which almost divide the block in two.
